page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: In December 1983 there were 2985 policemen in the Avon and Somerset constabulary.In the Ilminster section there are eleven policemen and one sergeant.The Ilminster (West) beat is ten square miles and 4100 people live in it. The policemen may have to cover up to thirty miles.In Broadway there are about two burglaries a year,people are very law abiding.Our local policeman deals with criminal damage,theft and road accidents. He has a car with a radio telephone to go from village to village,and the control room at Yeovil can talk to him, but when he is out walking he cannot be contacted.When you dial 999 your message goes to the Yeovil control room which sends the nearest policeman in a car.
